Headline: Senior Software Engineer @ Transferz | React, Nextjs, Nodejs, Python, ...
Summary: Seasoned software engineer with 13+ years of experience building scalable, user-focused solutions across diverse domains. For the past 8 years, I’ve specialized in full-stack development with a strong focus on modern frontend engineering—creating performant, responsive, and maintainable UIs that deliver exceptional user experiences.  I’m passionate about raising the bar in engineering culture: mentoring junior and mid-level developers, promoting best practices, and ensuring code quality, resilience, and scalability from day one. Thanks to my full-stack background, I excel at bridging frontend and backend teams, translating business goals into seamless end-to-end solutions.  Driven by curiosity and a commitment to excellence, I care not only about what works—but about building products and teams that thrive long term.
